values: Saying Beautifully as a Way of Seeing Beauty: The Life of George Herbert and His Poetic EffortSaying Beautifully as a Way of Seeing Beauty: The Life of George Herbert and His Poetic Effort

George Herbert’s work and effort shows that words in our life matter. And how we use them can help us capture what’s really beautiful.George Herbert’s work and effort shows that words in our life matter. And how we use them can help us capture what’s really beautiful.
